contest-event.event-date:
July 16, 1927 D Oxfordshire & District Contest (Section 1)
Oxfordshire & District Contest (Section 1) 10 Test Piece Contest Oxfordshire & District Contest oxfordshire-district-contest-section-1
Gounod [arr. W. Rimmer]
White House Ground, Abingdon Road, Oxford, Oxfordshire, UK Open to all bands. 3 bands played.
1st prize: Hawkes & Son Challenge Shield, £12.12.0 2nd prize: £6.6.0 3rd prize: £3.3.0 Medals for best solo cornet, euphonium, tenor trombone Silver medal with gold centre for best soprano, given by Mr. T. Beresford of Morris Motors band.
Special prize: Higham Challenge Cup for the best cornet soloist of the day, open to all sections. To become the property of any player winning it three years in succession.
March 29, 2013, 9:39 a.m. March 11, 2021, 11:23 a.m.
1 Hanwell Band Willie Greenwood
2 Great Central and Met Railway Unknown
2 Morris Motors Band Fred Dimmock
